snoopy.blindnote: 2009年6月17日（山元）snoRNABaseより。 Homo sapiens ACA51 snoRNA This H/ACA box RNA was cloned by Kiss et al. (2004) from a HeLa cell extract immunoprecipitated with an anti-GAR1 antibody. It has no identified target RNA. As the C/D box snoRNA HBII-55, ACA51 snoRNA gene is located in an intron the NOL5A (nucleolar protein 5A) gene. The NOL5A protein is the orthologue of the yeast Nop56p protein, and is a common constituent of the C/D box snoRNPs. (20100623末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Kiss, A. M., Jady, B. E., Bertrand, E., and Kiss, T. (2004). Human box H/ACA pseudouridylation guide RNA machinery. Mol. Cell .Biol. 24, 5797-5807.
